title: Kennen E
body: Kennen's E says it double his base move speed which is 335 which would be 670 but when you use it you dont get 670 movespeed

replies.body: Because soft caps apply. All movement speed above 415 gets cut by 20%, and all MS above 490 gets cut by 50%. Other ways it would be to easy to reach ridiculous speeds.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBadBadger,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1zAuQiIW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-02T07:04:19.743+0000)
>
> Because soft caps apply. All movement speed above 415 gets cut by 20%, and all MS above 490 gets cut by 50%. Other ways it would be to easy to reach ridiculous speeds.

Oh okay thanks =)
